location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, and his assistant, George Green, to Captains Charles Elphinstone and Lawrence Nilson, commanders of the expedition against Carrack [Kharg Island]

mods.abstract: The letter is cover for copies of letters from George Skipp, in which it is advised that the Caun [Karim Khan] intends to lend his assistance as soon as the attack on Kharg is underway.
